amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provisions in the bill that deem approved any project for which the reviewing agency does not issue the requested permit or license within the required 90-120 days.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-261 to strike the bill provision that deems approved any project for which the reviewing agency does not issue the requested permit or license within 90-120 days.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 237 (Roll no. 511).

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
